excerpt: "Still, the researchers believe Tinnibot and similar chatbots might become a valuable tool for people who might otherwise benefit from talk therapy. In the future, they hope to conduct similar studies that incorporate control groups, periodic brain scans, and attention to other mental health pitfalls that could compromise participants’ success."
